divs: Sighting DetailsI was trying to capture lightning from a distant storm. I was using 35mm film and a tripod bracketing exposures from 1 to 5 seconds. I had pointed my camera (Nikon FM2) in the general direction from which the lightning was accuring. Using a cable release to trip the shutter so that no camera shake would be transfered to the picture. When the lightning would flash I would trip the shutter. I had no idea that I was capturing anything other than the lightning until I got the film processed and printed. There are 3 clear images of what appears to be a UFO. I am a professional photographer and in no way have I manipulated or enhanced these exposures. I can't remember the exact date when these were shot.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Morrilton
